title: Mercedes-Benz India launches EQS 580 4MATIC electric SUV starting at â‚¹1.41 cr
description: Mercedes-Benz India has launched the locally produced EQS 580 4MATIC electric SUV, priced at Rs 1.41 crore. This marks the second locally produced EV by the company in India. The move aligns with the Make-in-India initiative and aims to promote electrification and provide more choices to customers.
